structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Disposition of persons arrested by TVA peace officer.
law.text: The keepers of jails in any county or municipality wherein the violation occurs for which any such arrest is made by a TVA peace officer shall receive all persons arrested by such officers to be dealt with according to law, and persons so arrested shall be received by keepers of jails on the same basis and shall have the same status as prisoners arrested by any other police officer.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 5, effective June 17, 1978.
